r.s: Net_Curl provides an OO interface to PHP's cURL extension
r.d: Provides an OO interface to PHP's curl extension
r.n: - Fixed a bug in setOption() that resulted in options not being set - Rearranged verifyPeer/verifyHost handling so you can now turn off all SSL verification - Changed some of the internal code to use setOption() instead of curl_setopt() - Updated the example fetchPage.php to take the URL as a command-line argument - Updated the example fetchPage.php to use Net_Curl::create() as this is now best practice - Removed David Costa from maintainer list in package.xml
